analysis.description: Veridex automatically validates crypto trading signals across multiple blockchains, turning noisy Telegram/email tips into clear, risk-scored opportunities. It gives traders and signal services a real-time dashboard and API to filter out scams, assess liquidity, and focus capital on the safest, highest-potential tokens.

valueProposition: Automated, multi-chain validation and risk scoring of crypto trading signals (BSC, Solana, Base) to quickly separate legitimate opportunities from scams.
One-click workflow from unstructured email/Telegram signals to a structured dashboard with real-time metrics, liquidity data, and clear risk categories.
API-first infrastructure that signal providers and tools can embed to increase trust, reduce fraud exposure, and differentiate their paid offerings.

customerSegments.name: Retail and semi-professional crypto traders using third-party signals
pain_points: High risk of rug pulls, honeypots, and illiquid tokens in signal channels
Lack of time and expertise to manually vet token contracts, liquidity, and holder concentration

customerSegments.name: Crypto trading-signal providers and copy-trading platforms
pain_points: Low user trust due to inconsistent signal quality and scam exposure
Need to demonstrate transparent risk controls and signal validation to justify subscription pricing

customerSegments.name: Risk-aware crypto investors and small crypto funds
pain_points: Need systematic pre-trade risk checks across many small-cap tokens and chains
Fragmented data sources for liquidity, volume anomalies, and contract risk indicators

revenueStreams.source: B2B API licensing for signal providers, copy-trading platforms, and wallets
White-label dashboard and risk-scoring modules for funds and pro communities
